attributes.action: Reverse the decision to withdraw British forces from Germany
attributes.additional_details: In light of the conflict in Ukraine continuing to escalate despite the recent truce and the Defence Secretary's comments today  on the "real and present danger" posed by the Russian threat to the Baltic states isn't it time that the MOD reconsiders its ludicrous position on the 2013 decision to withdraw approximately 11,000 troops from British Forces Germany?
